title: Professional Development
content:
Core ML Positions

  • ML Engineer: Building and deploying ML systems
  • Data Scientist: Extracting insights from data
  • Research Scientist: Advancing state-of-the-art methods
  • AI Product Manager: Guiding AI product development

Domain-Specific Roles

  • Computer Vision Engineer: Visual data processing
  • NLP Engineer: Text and language processing
  • AI Ethics Specialist: Ensuring responsible AI
  • ML Ops Engineer: Managing ML infrastructure

Professional Credentials

  • Industry Certifications: Cloud ML specializations, professional ML engineer certifications
  • University Programs: Specialized graduate certificates
  • Vendor-specific Credentials: Platform expertise certification

Skill Verification

  • Technical Assessments: Practical ML implementation skills
  • Theoretical Knowledge: Understanding core principles from CS229 and HUJI materials
  • Project Portfolio: Demonstrating applied expertise

Resources

CS229, HUJI materials - Foundations for professional growth and skill development
